entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
